text:
Ehehe...
How do I look, Producer-san...!

Wow...!
Yeah, it suits you really well.

Oh no, not quite...!
It's like the costume hasn't quite settled in yet...

But... I really felt
the reality of becoming an idol...!
Haha, you haven't felt it before?

I might have felt it a little...
But not as much as now, I think.

──Either way,
I'm still at the entrance of being an idol...

────From now on,
will I get to learn a lot about being an idol...?
